Text:
Keep those comments coming, good or bad.

At least I know that someone watches it !!
About the only thing that we Brits can still be proud of is the BBC !!
Thanks mac.moe. If only there were more seeders... I'll make sure to seed this for as long as possible.
Thanks for this. The Beeb & PBS Frontline still retain their credibility & objectivity. Not like network TV here in the States.
